description: Adding more themes in the application will make it look and feel better

I think sublime text editor can be tweaked for competitive programming and is more stable then this editor. 

It is worth trying for sure.
summary: Nice editor but I would personally prefer sublime text editor

description:
I installed this from the Ubuntu store and it just doesn't work.

I get a sort of beachball icon, indicating that something is trying to happen and then...nothing. Uninstalling. I'll stick to Jupyter Notebook.
